comments: n such that a(n+1)=3*a(n) is given by A065554. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 21 2003a(n) = (fractional part of (3/2)^n without the decimal point)/5^n  =   A204544(n) / 5^n. - _Michel Lagneau_, Jan 25 2012
